data.event: Founded in 1831, Velasco is situated on the east side of the Brazos River in southeast Texas.

event.title: 1837, the final actions of the Battle of Brazos River occurred

data.event: In 1837, the final actions of the Battle of Brazos River occurred there.
In 1821, the schooner Lively landed at the site with thirty-eight men, the first of Stephen F. Austin's colonists.
